other_tests.findings: Nodules consisting of a mass of arthrospores and hyphae sleeving the hair shaft.
Culture grew creamy yellow-white colonies identified as Trichosporon beigelii.
Grew a Corynebacterium and a Brevibacterium species.
Revealed masses of bacteria, hyphae sleeving the hair shaft, and, in a few sections, hyphae lifting the cuticle.

other_tests.procedure_name: IgM â€“ fluorescent treponemal antibody test
other_tests.findings: Promptly led to the diagnosis of secondary syphilis.
